game.name: Princess Balloon Festival
game.description:
The three beautiful princesses Bella, Emma and Mia are planning to attend the highly popular annual Balloon Festival. These fashion divas look pretty excited for the event, but are a bit confused what to wear to look gorgeous. Do you have any outfit ideas for the three girls? Join Princess Balloon Festival and be prepared to guide these three beauties to wear the amazing balloon themed outfits and accessories! Their wardrobe is full of trendy and stylish dresses and accessories.

Try to be quick as they also want to frame their final looks for future in this brand new girls game! Browse through their exclusive and wider outfit range and choose the clothing pieces that match their personality! Begin with Emma who loves to carry a sleeveless white short dress with yellow and red colour balloons in the bottom or you can also finalize a purple balloon themed dress for her! Give her a pair of matching shoes, and then combine her look with the suitable jewellery, hairband, and a purse!

Click the right tick button to move forward to the next girl Belle who looks fabulous in the red and yellow short balloon dress! You can also choose a long red colour balloon themed dress or a red and black outfit. Combine her look with matching jewellery, hairstyle, a pair of shoes and a purse! Now move to the next and final girl Mia who looks fabulous in sleeveless red short combined with colourful balloons at the bottom. Mix and as match as many dresses and accessories to get the ready for the festival in this HTML5 dressing game! Check out other popular girls dress-up games for free and have fun with your friends, no download required!
